item.title: Maxout Code Glitch
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

replace with mine

{
addSkillXP(486000000, 0);
addSkillXP(486000000, 1);
addSkillXP(486000000, 2);
addSkillXP(486000000, 3);
addSkillXP(486000000, 4);

item.title: Maxout Code Glitch
item.dc:creator: @Land Land
item.description:
@Land wrote:

I used a maxout code on my server, but my stats stayed at 1/99. The stat limit for my server is 99. I tried waiting, logging out/in, and editing the char file, but nothing worked. If it helps, the code is:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("maxout") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[1]), 1); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[2]), 2); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[4]), 4); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[5]), 5); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[6]), 6); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[7]), 7); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[8]), 8); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[9]), 9); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[10]), 10); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[11]), 11); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[12]), 12); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[13]), 13); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[14]), 14); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[15]), 15); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[16]), 16); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[17]), 17); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[18]), 18); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[19]), 19); addSkillXP((140000000*playerLevel[20]), 20); sendMessage("You've maxed out your skills. Noob!"); }

Read full topic
